name: javap-json
description: Java program like javap which prints output in json
author: Sebastian Gurin

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run javac && mkdir dist && mkdir tmp && cd tmp && cp ../java-src/*.class . &&  unzip ../java-lib/gson-2.8.5.jar && rm -rf META-INF && jar cvfe javap-json.jar JavapJsonOutput . && mv javap-json.jar ../dist && cd .. && rm -rf tmp
scripts.test: npm run build && java -jar dist/javap-json.jar org.apache.lucene.store.RAMDirectory,org.apache.lucene.store.LockFactory,org.apache.lucene.util.Accountable,org.apache.lucene.util.FilterIterator ../node-lucene/lucene-lib/lucene-core-7.4.0.jar,../node-lucene/lucene-lib/lucene-queryparser-7.4.0.jar && rm -rf tmp java-src/*.class
scripts.java-test1: npm run javac && java -cp "java-lib/gson-2.8.5.jar:java-src" JavapJsonOutput java.lang.String,java.util.List
